problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains integer n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers (-10000 <= a_i <= 10000).
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - the maximum sum of contiguous subarray.

problems.title: Rotate Array
problems.description: Given an array, rotate the array to the right by k steps, where k is non-negative.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= n <= 100000, 0 <= k <= 1000000000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - the rotated array.

problems.title: Find Missing Number
problems.description: Given an array nums containing n distinct numbers in the range [0, n], return the only number in the range that is missing from the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains integer n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - the missing number.

problems.title: Product of Array Except Self
problems.description: Return an array where answer[i] is equal to the product of all elements except nums[i]. Must be O(n) without division.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (2 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - the product array.

problems.title: Container With Most Water
problems.description: Find two lines that together with the x-axis form a container with maximum water.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (2 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers (heights).

problems.title: Find All Duplicates
problems.description: Find all integers that appear twice in array where all integers are in range [1, n]. O(n) time, O(1) space.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print duplicates space-separated or empty line.

problems.title: Two Sum
problems.description: Given an array and a target, return indices of two numbers that add up to target.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and target (2 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Three Sum
problems.description: Find all unique triplets in array that sum to zero.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (3 <= n <= 3000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print each triplet on new line, sorted. Print triplets in sorted order.

problems.title: Merge Intervals
problems.description: Given array of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Next n lines contain two integers - start and end.
problems.outputFormat: Print merged intervals, one per line.

problems.title: Move Zeroes
problems.description: Move all zeroes to end while maintaining relative order of non-zero elements.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
problems.description: Find maximum profit from one transaction. You can buy on one day and sell on a future day.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers (prices).
problems.outputFormat: Print maximum profit. Print 0 if no profit possible.

problems.title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
problems.description: Search for target in rotated sorted array in O(log n) time.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and target (1 <= n <= 5000). Second line contains n distinct integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print index of target or -1 if not found.

problems.title: Maximum Product Subarray
problems.description: Find contiguous subarray with largest product.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 20000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
problems.description: Find minimum element in rotated sorted array in O(log n).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 5000). Second line contains n unique integers.

problems.title: Contains Duplicate
problems.description: Return true if any value appears at least twice in the array.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Majority Element
problems.description: Find element that appears more than n/2 times. Always exists.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Sort Colors
problems.description: Sort array with only 0s, 1s, and 2s in-place.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 300). Second line contains n integers (0, 1, or 2).

problems.title: 4Sum
problems.description: Find all unique quadruplets that sum to target.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and target (4 <= n <= 200). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print each quadruplet on new line in sorted order.

problems.title: Jump Game
problems.description: Determine if you can reach the last index. Each element represents max jump length.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Subarray Sum Equals K
problems.description: Find total number of continuous subarrays whose sum equals k.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= n <= 20000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Spiral Matrix
problems.description: Return all elements of matrix in spiral order.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n (1 <= m,n <= 100). Next m lines contain n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in spiral order space-separated.

problems.title: Rotate Image
problems.description: Rotate n x n matrix by 90 degrees clockwise in-place.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 20). Next n lines contain n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print rotated matrix, n integers per line.

problems.title: Set Matrix Zeroes
problems.description: If element is 0, set its entire row and column to 0. Do it in-place.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n (1 <= m,n <= 200). Next m lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Next Permutation
problems.description: Rearrange numbers into next lexicographically greater permutation. If not possible, return lowest order.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: First Missing Positive
problems.description: Find smallest missing positive integer. Must be O(n) time and O(1) space.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Trapping Rain Water
problems.description: Compute how much water can be trapped after raining given elevation map.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 20000). Second line contains n integers (heights).

problems.title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
problems.description: Find length of longest consecutive elements sequence. Must be O(n).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (0 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Sliding Window Maximum
problems.description: Find maximum in each sliding window of size k.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= k <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print n-k+1 integers - max in each window.

problems.title: Find Peak Element
problems.description: Find a peak element (greater than neighbors). Array may contain multiple peaks.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 1000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print index of any peak element.

problems.title: Kth Largest Element
problems.description: Find the kth largest element in unsorted array.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= k <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Find First and Last Position
problems.description: Find starting and ending position of target in sorted array. O(log n) required.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and target (0 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n sorted integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print start and end indices or -1 -1.

problems.title: Merge Sorted Array
problems.description: Merge two sorted arrays into first array which has enough space.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Second line contains m+n integers (first m are valid). Third line contains n integers.

problems.title: Pascal's Triangle
problems.description: Generate first numRows of Pascal's triangle.
problems.inputFormat: Single integer numRows (1 <= numRows <= 30).
problems.outputFormat: Print each row on new line, space-separated.

problems.title: Insert Interval
problems.description: Insert new interval into sorted non-overlapping intervals and merge if necessary.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (0 <= n <= 10000). Next n lines contain intervals. Last line contains new interval.

problems.title: Plus One
problems.description: Add one to number represented as array of digits.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100). Second line contains n digits.

problems.title: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
problems.description: Remove duplicates in-place from sorted array, return new length.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (0 <= n <= 30000). Second line contains n sorted integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print length k, then first k elements.

problems.title: Valid Mountain Array
problems.description: Check if array is valid mountain (strictly increasing then strictly decreasing).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Find All Numbers Disappeared
problems.description: Find all numbers in [1,n] that don't appear in array. O(n) time, O(1) space.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Third Maximum Number
problems.description: Return third distinct maximum. If doesn't exist, return maximum.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Find Pivot Index
problems.description: Find leftmost pivot index where left sum equals right sum.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

testCases.explanation: Left sum = right sum at index 3

problems.title: Longest Subarray of 1s After Deleting One
problems.description: Find length of longest subarray of 1s after deleting exactly one element.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n binary integers.

problems.title: Max Consecutive Ones III
problems.description: Find max consecutive 1s if you can flip at most k 0s.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= n <= 100000, 0 <= k <= n). Second line contains n binary integers.

problems.title: Minimum Size Subarray Sum
problems.description: Find minimal length of subarray with sum >= target.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains target and n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n positive integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print minimal length or 0 if impossible.

problems.title: Longest Turbulent Subarray
problems.description: Find length of longest turbulent subarray (alternating comparisons).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 40000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Maximum Sum Circular Subarray
problems.description: Find maximum sum of circular subarray.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 30000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Maximum Absolute Sum
problems.description: Find maximum absolute value of sum of any subarray.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Shortest Subarray with Sum at Least K
problems.description: Find length of shortest non-empty subarray with sum at least k.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Number of Subarrays with Bounded Maximum
problems.description: Count subarrays where maximum is in range [left, right].
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n, left, right (1 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Monotonic Array
problems.description: Check if array is monotonic (all increasing or all decreasing).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Advantage Shuffle
problems.description: Permute nums1 to maximize number of positions where nums1[i] > nums2[i].
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Next two lines contain n integers each.

problems.title: Array Partition
problems.description: Partition 2n integers into n pairs to maximize sum of min of each pair.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains 2n integers.

problems.title: Maximum Gap
problems.description: Find maximum difference between successive elements in sorted form. Must be linear time.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Wiggle Sort
problems.description: Reorder array so nums[0] <= nums[1] >= nums[2] <= nums[3]...
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print any valid wiggle sorted array.

problems.title: Wiggle Sort II
problems.description: Reorder so nums[0] < nums[1] > nums[2] < nums[3]... (strict inequalities).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Partition Array Into Three Parts
problems.description: Check if array can be partitioned into three non-empty parts with equal sum.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (3 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Check If N and Its Double Exist
problems.description: Check if there exist two indices where arr[i] = 2 * arr[j].
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (2 <= n <= 500). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Replace Elements with Greatest on Right
problems.description: Replace every element with greatest element on right side. Last becomes -1.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Height Checker
problems.description: Count students not standing in correct position (expected is sorted array).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100). Second line contains n integers (heights).

problems.title: Relative Sort Array
problems.description: Sort arr1 so relative order matches arr2, then remaining in ascending order.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and m. Second line contains n integers (arr1). Third line contains m integers (arr2).
constraints: All arr2 elements appear in arr1

problems.title: Sum of Even Numbers After Queries
problems.description: After each query (add val to arr[index]), return sum of even numbers.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and q (1 <= n,q <= 10000). Second line contains n integers. Next q lines contain val and index.
problems.outputFormat: Print q integers - sum after each query.

problems.title: Queries on Number of Points Inside Circle
problems.description: Count points inside each circle query.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and q. Next n lines contain x,y coordinates. Next q lines contain cx,cy,radius.
problems.outputFormat: Print q integers - count for each query.

problems.title: Count Good Triplets
problems.description: Count triplets where |arr[i]-arr[j]|<=a, |arr[j]-arr[k]|<=b, |arr[i]-arr[k]|<=c.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n,a,b,c (3 <= n <= 100). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Find Lucky Integer
problems.description: Find largest lucky integer (value equals frequency). Return -1 if none.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 500). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Count Negative Numbers in Sorted Matrix
problems.description: Count negative numbers in m x n matrix sorted descending row-wise and column-wise.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n integers each.

problems.title: Matrix Diagonal Sum
problems.description: Return sum of matrix diagonals. Count middle element once if n is odd.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n. Next n lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Lucky Numbers in Matrix
problems.description: Find lucky numbers (minimum in row and maximum in column).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print lucky numbers space-separated or empty line.

problems.title: Reshape the Matrix
problems.description: Reshape m x n matrix to r x c. Return original if impossible.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m,n,r,c. Next m lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Toeplitz Matrix
problems.description: Check if matrix is Toeplitz (every diagonal same values).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Flipping an Image
problems.description: Flip image horizontally then invert (0->1, 1->0).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n. Next n lines contain n binary integers.

problems.title: Transpose Matrix
problems.description: Return transpose of matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Valid Sudoku
problems.description: Determine if 9x9 Sudoku board is valid.
problems.inputFormat: 9 lines with 9 characters each. '.' for empty, 1-9 for filled.

problems.title: Diagonal Traverse
problems.description: Return all elements in diagonal order.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Kth Smallest Element in Sorted Matrix
problems.description: Find kth smallest element in n x n matrix sorted row and column wise.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k. Next n lines contain n integers.

problems.title: Search a 2D Matrix
problems.description: Search target in matrix sorted left-to-right and top-to-bottom. O(log(m*n)) required.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m,n,target. Next m lines contain n sorted integers.

problems.title: Game of Life
problems.description: Apply Game of Life rules to m x n grid. Update in-place.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n binary integers.

problems.title: Candy
problems.description: Give minimum candies where higher rated child gets more than neighbors.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 20000). Second line contains n integers (ratings).

problems.title: Gas Station
problems.description: Find starting gas station to complete circuit. Return -1 if impossible.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n. Second line contains n integers (gas). Third line contains n integers (cost).

problems.title: Queue Reconstruction by Height
problems.description: Reconstruct queue where [h,k] means height h with k people >= h in front.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n. Next n lines contain two integers h and k.
problems.outputFormat: Print reconstructed queue, one pair per line.

problems.title: Non-decreasing Array
problems.description: Check if array can become non-decreasing by modifying at most one element.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Largest Number
problems.description: Arrange numbers to form largest number.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100). Second line contains n non-negative integers.

problems.title: Task Scheduler
problems.description: Find minimum intervals to complete all tasks with n cooldown between same task.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains num tasks and n. Second line contains tasks (characters A-Z).

testCases.input:
6 2
A A A B B B

6 0
A A A B B B

problems.title: Subarray Product Less Than K
problems.description: Count subarrays where product of all elements is less than k.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and k (1 <= n <= 50000). Second line contains n positive integers.

problems.title: Max Chunks To Make Sorted
problems.description: Find max number of chunks to sort array (permutation of [0..n-1]).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10). Second line contains n integers (permutation).

problems.title: Max Chunks To Make Sorted II
problems.description: Find max chunks for arbitrary array (may have duplicates).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 2000). Second line contains n integers.

problems.title: Partition Labels
problems.description: Partition string into max pieces where each letter appears in at most one part.
problems.inputFormat: Single line with string s (1 <= length <= 500, lowercase letters).

problems.title: Minimum Domino Rotations
problems.description: Find minimum rotations to make all tops or bottoms same value.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n. Second line contains n integers (tops). Third line contains n integers (bottoms).

problems.title: Asteroid Collision
problems.description: Find state of asteroids after collisions. Positive = right, negative = left.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (2 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n non-zero integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print remaining asteroids space-separated or empty line.

problems.title: Daily Temperatures
problems.description: Find days until warmer temperature for each day.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers (temperatures).
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - days to wait.

problems.title: Next Greater Element I
problems.description: For each element in nums1, find next greater element in nums2.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and m. Second line contains n integers (nums1). Third line contains m integers (nums2).
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - next greater or -1.

problems.title: Next Greater Element II
problems.description: Find next greater element in circular array.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 10000). Second line contains n integers.
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - next greater or -1.

problems.title: Online Stock Span
problems.description: For each price query, return span (max consecutive days with price <= today).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (queries). Next n lines contain single integer (price).
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - span for each query.

problems.title: Remove K Digits
problems.description: Remove k digits from number string to get smallest possible number.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains string num. Second line contains k.

problems.title: Car Fleet
problems.description: Count car fleets arriving at target (cars catch up become fleet).
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n and target. Second line contains n positions. Third line contains n speeds.

problems.title: Largest Rectangle in Histogram
problems.description: Find area of largest rectangle in histogram.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains n (1 <= n <= 100000). Second line contains n integers (heights).

problems.title: Maximal Rectangle
problems.description: Find largest rectangle containing only 1s in binary matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line contains m and n. Next m lines contain n binary integers.
